author: senh
title: Fans get chance to plot NFL's tech future
text: BING NEWS: Fans Get Chance to Plot NFL's Tech Future Developing ideas into realities is Microsoft's business. Now, the technology giant is inviting NFL fans to come up with those ideas. The prizes in what Microsoft is calling the "Imagine Bowl," are enticing.
